title: Can I Not Buy Champions I Want To Buy?
body: So far I only got full champions while leveling but I think I need blue essence to actually buy new champions. The free rotation is kind of fun right now but I really wanna buy some of the champions I'm interested in! When can I get blue essence? Do I need to start playing the PvP games? I'm kind of scared to hop into that so early on x:

replies.body: with how the currency is now your better off opening your wallet and buying the champs. its going to take you a LONG time to buy even the mid priced champs.

Currently, you'll be able to grab BE through leveling up your account, champion mastery, and honor.  We've updated our [BE breakdown guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824-Reward-BE-XP-System-Breakdown#h5)with info, but for now leveling up may be your best bet.
At what level will I be getting blue essence from leveling up? It's only shown that I got champions from leveling up so far like Ashe, Garen, and Brand.
by going to the loot tab and rightclicking the champion shards you can disenchant them for blue essence
The loot button is greyed out. Maybe I haven't unlocked it yet? I'm only level 4 but so far every level has just given me a champ right away I think...
